thread.title: EYMA
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by EYMA

author: EYMA
title: EYMA
text: I have been using American Frame for years after it was recommended by a photographer friend. The frames are shipped promptly and always assemble perfectly. Using the non-glare acrylic has really made a difference in displaying my photos. I recommend the company to anyone who asks where I get my framing material. Their customer service always responds promptly and takes care of any matter presented. It is a pleasure to deal with them.
